title: Bug 7945: Search results not selected in external jar
description: When performing a search for references to a field in an external jar (Build 200201151), the search results are not being selected. Specifically, when searching for references to the field 'tmpFir' in the class java.io.File, the search results are not automatically selected.
OB: When performing the search for references to the field 'tmpFir' in the class java.io.File, the search results are not being automatically selected.
EB: The expected behavior is that the search results for references to the field 'tmpFir' in the class java.io.File should be automatically selected.
SR: To reproduce the issue, follow these steps: 1. Ensure that JDK1.3.1 is set as the default JRE and that you have the source for rt.jar. 2. Open java.io.File in the project. 3. Perform a search for references to the field 'tmpFir'. 4. Observe that the search results are not automatically selected.
